head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HOROWITZ, LOUIS L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HOROWITZ, LOUIS L.

block.p: HOROWITZ-Louis L. Died on April 28, 2000 in Aventura, FL. Beloved father of Marcia Hochberg & Barbara Greenblatt. Dear father-in-law of Dr. Fred Hochberg and Philip Greenblatt. Cherished grandfather of Jeffrey and David Greenblatt and Ian Hochberg, Elizabeth Hochberg and her husband Michael Schloff. Lou was a former owner and partner of Benjamin Horowitz Monument Works. Funeral and interment were in Florida. He will be missed.

Funeral and interment were in Florida. He will be missed.
